description: Details required by condition 2 (submission of details - (a) all new skirting and cornices; (b) all new fireplaces (inserts and surrounds); c) notwithstanding the approved drawings, a full door schedule showing details of doors to be retained and those to be replaced (all new doors to be 4 panelled recessed Victorian style in sold timber); (d) all new lighting; (e) elevation drawings of proposed fitted kitchen units (with relationship to cornices and skirting boards); (f) all new service runs (internal and external details) including plumbing runs for kitchens; (g) details of any existing skirting boards, dado rails and picture rails that are to be removed, and details of any replacements of these features) of Listed Building consent LB/19/06250 (Internal alterations and reconfiguration to create 8 self-contained residential units (5 x studio and 3 x 1 bed) to replace houses of multiple occupation use (HMO) occupied as bedsits with associated external alterations)
